Reverie presents five nights of discovery

Explore the best sound Reverie has to offer with a lineup of 25 artists. The best sets of 2020 all under pacific coast skies. The best part? It's free.

View Schedule

About

20 artists
5 nights

Infini is about looking ahead. Taking care of your life off the grid and listening to Reverie’s best and newest in electronic music. Having begun life as an outlet for the deeper and more progressive end of the trio’s DJ sets, Reverie has grown into one of the dance music world’s most respected imprints. Over its 15 years and 300+ releases, the sound of the label has evolved, but while the BPMs may have slowed, the mission statement of Reverie has remained the same - to release timeless soulful and melodic electronic music.

2020 Schedule
